Topic.Title: How to stop the player from taking routes from a previous path in gamebooks?

Posts.EditableText: So the player can start in room one and have the choice to go to room two or room three. Say they choose room two. In the game, after choosing, both choices are still highlighted (even while the text from page 2 would show up normally) and players would be allowed to just go straight to room 3 from room 2, even if it isn't linked.

Posts.EditableText:
You could always just clearscreen before entering the room.
That way, the previous room, and links, are not visible.
